# JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.custom(_:)

**Case**

The strategy that formats custom dates by calling a user-defined function.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency case custom((any Decoder) throws -> Date)
```

## Custom Formats

- **JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.formatted(_:)**: The strategy that defers formatting settings to a supplied date formatter.
